pages.text: 69|35|atah, nahin hai usaka aaj yahaan koee mitr.
69|36|aur na koee bhojan, peep ke siva.
69|37|jise paapee hee khaayenge.
69|38|to main shapath leta hoon usakee, jo tum dekhate ho.
69|39|tatha jo tum nahin dekhate ho.
69|40|nihsandeh, ye (quraan) aadaraneey rasool ka kathan[1] hai.
69|41|aur vah kisee kavi ka kathan nahin hai. tum log kam hee vishvaas karate ho.
69|42|aur na vah kisee jyotishee ka kathan hai, tum kam kee shiksha grahan karate ho.
69|43|sarvalok ke paalanahaar ka utaara hua hai.
69|44|aur yadi isane (nabee ne) hamapar koee baat banaee[1] hotee.
69|45|to avashy ham pakad lete usaka seedha haath.
69|46|phir avashy kaat dete usake gale kee rag.
69|47|phir tumamen se koee (mujhe) usase rokane vaala na hota.
69|48|nihsandeh, ye ek shiksha hai sadaachaariyon ke lie.
69|49|tatha vaastav mein ham jaanate hain ki tumamen kuchh jhuthalaane vaale hain.
69|50|aur nishchay ye pachhataave ka kaaran hoga kaafiron[1] ke lie.
69|51|vastutah, ye vishvasaneey saty hai.
69|52|atah, aap pavitrata ka varnan karen apane mahimaavaan paalanahaar ke naam kee.
70|1|prashn kiya ek prashn karane[1] vaale ne us yaatana ke baare mein, jo aane vaalee hai.
70|2|kaafiron par. nahin hai jise koee door karane vaala.
70|3|allaah oonchaeeyon vaale kee or se.
70|4|chadhate hain farishte tatha roohî€¼[1] jisakee or, ek din mein, jisaka maap pachaas hazaar varsh hai.
70|5|atah, (he nabee!) aap sahan[1] karen achchhe prakaar se.
70|6|ve samajhate hain use door.
70|7|aur ham dekh rahe hain use sameep.
70|8|jis din ho jaayega aakaash pighalee huee dhaatu ke samaan.
70|9|tatha ho jaayenge parvat, rangaarang dhune hue oon ke samaan.
70|10|aur nahin poochhega koee mitr kisee mitr ko.
